task.title: How to Subtract Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using your calculator app. to subtract numbers.

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must understand subtraction.

result.p: The result from the subtraction is displayed.

taskbody.example:
Example:
You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like 3-2=1. Press the 3 button. Press the minus (-) button. Press the 2 button. Press the equals (=) button.
The result, the number 1, will appear on the display.
